Posts.Content: Baberjean wrote: I had my surgery, and it looks like the Dr got all the cancer in the lump.  She removed 2 lymph nodes and had them tested, and they came back negative.  I will have the final results on Tuesday. I have to tell anyone facing surgery, go to town and by yourself a sports type bra that zips or snaps int he front.  Mine has been a lifesaver as far as helping with the pain.  I took it off this morning to take a shower and reliezed how I would feel without it.  I couldn't wait to get it back on.  I got mine at JC Penneys. I now have to have radiation.  If anyone  out there has had it, please let me know what to expect.  I am a little scared about it, but if I have to do it I will.   Thank you Barb T Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Hasd surgrery yesterday Baberjean Baberjean

Posts.Content: Jan 2, 2009 03:16AM Baberjean wrote: rubybuttons,  I bought my regular size bra and it fit fine.    Good luck with your surgery.
